name: Escape Room Game (Carmine Oak, Gilokk0)
description:
This is a game I've been making for over an year, mostly because I was too lazy to finish it until now. No SFXs.

Play through 10 levels of this little Escape Room Game in any order.

How to play:
  • WASD/Arrow Keys: Move
  • Z/J/Alt: A
  • X/K/Ctrl: B
  • Enter: Start
  • Shift: Select
